function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to detect asymptomatic COVID-19 cases in CT images","Impact":"Increased risk of undetected transmission and spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implement more sensitive and specific image analysis techniques","Technologies":"Advanced AI algorithms for image interpretation","People":"Healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Inconsistent international regulations for COVID-19 chest CT image data sharing","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness in controlling and managing the spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Establish clear and standardized guidelines for data sharing and analysis","Technologies":"Blockchain technology for secure and transparent data sharing","People":"Global health organizations and regulatory bodies","Owner":"International health agencies"},{"Description":"Poor data quality and sharing in COVID-19 chest CT image analysis","Impact":"Misdiagnosis, ineffective treatment, and compromised research findings","Mitigation":"Adopt standardized data quality control measures and sharing protocols","Technologies":"Blockchain for data integrity verification and AI for data analysis","People":"Healthcare professionals, researchers","Owner":"Healthcare and research institutions"}]}
